post:
Happy New Year to all LET members!

We are from Pump Cloud, a brand of Pump Inc.

Today we are bringing our exclusive 2017 New Year promotion, 20% off all products!

All our VPSes are KVM, and equipped with 100% SSD.

Use coupon: **NEWYEAR2017** to get 20% off, coupo vaild until Jan 3.

Our Los Angeles product line (with China Telecom CN2) is restocked. And we've launched our new Warsaw (WAW) line!

Windows OS is available on Plan 2 or higher plans.

Payments: PayPal (fixed, no longer via 2CO), Alipay, Credit Card (Visa, MC, AMEX, Discover, Unionpay, JCB, Diners Club)

P.S.: Full service is available in French too.

Looking glass: [LA](http://lg-lax.pumpcloud.net) [BHS](http://lg-bhs.pumpcloud.net) [SBG](http://sbg-lax.pumpcloud.net)

PRICE LISTED BELOW IS AFTER USING COUPON **NEWYEAR2017**

1 vCPU Core @ 3.3GHz, 512MB RAM, 10GB SSD, 500GB traffic, 1Gbps uplink
